report.title: Meditation
report.author: waterborn
report.bodytext: My girlfriend and I were hanging out and listening to music. I believe it was led zep. But recently I have been really concentrating on controlling my body and mind. I havent ever researched meditation or anything of a sort, so thats why I'm not sure what the hell happened. But here goes: /n /n I was lying down and was pretty damn high. I concentrated on the music in some sort of way I cant really explain. I let the music consume me and let my imagination run wild. It brought me to a place with laser lights and stuff. I close my eyes and all of a sudden a feeling came over me and I felt like I dropped down. It was like I dove down into a place. The feeling was intense and really unexplainable. I didnt want to leave this place so I concentrated on exploring it. I never had a real picture in my mind, but what I felt made me think I had a picture in my mind. I cant remember what I was seeing, but it was amazing. I opened my eyes to see my girlfriend next to me. She said she could see my pulse in my neck and that it was beating to the music. I didnt try to ever do this again just because I dont know if I can. It was that... crazy.
